to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Senior Application Developer Anthem Costa Mesa CA July 2003 to April 2019 Primary job duties included database design and maintenance data analysis of revenue trends and network performance creation and modification of custom applications and reports Developed a file schedulingprocessing automated tool replacing manual handling and eliminating errors MS Access application runs 247 checking prescheduled events such as a file arrival processing the file and sending notifications if requested All schedules are tablebased and easy to create or change The application uses SQL Server as a centralized data storage and produces reports in Excel Word and pdf formatsThis allowed the business unit to expand operations without hiring new members and to avoid fines for exceeding contractual processing time limits Created software solutions to comply with government regulations to replace time consuming manual data handling with an automated solution The program Access VBA imported data from different sources cleaned it up and combined to a single dataset to be sent to regulatory agencies The data was also preservedin a separate SQL Server database for historical data mining and ondemand reports creation Developed productivity metrics tools to generate reports monitor individual productivity and keep historical data enabling management to get reports within desired timeframe This increased productivity of the business unit Senior Software Developer Progressive America Santa Ana CA Developed specialized software VB VBNET
